amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: amendments numbered 55, 57, 59, 62, 66, 67, 68, 69, 65, and 60 printed in House Report 111-182.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the list of amendments submitted by the Chairman offered en bloc: amendments numbered 55, 57, 59, 62, 66, 67, 68, 69, 65, and 60 printed in House Report 111-182.

action.text: On agreeing to the Skelton amendments (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
